pr_title: Fully map out block state model generator

timeline.message:
Fully map out block state model generator

Now eliminated all unmapped classes! :tada:

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: CocoaBeans is the item, the block is just Cocoa
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,12 +1,422 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_4910 net/minecraft/data/client/model/BlockStateModelGenerator
-	FIELD field_22830 blockStateWriter Ljava/util/function/Consumer;
-	FIELD field_22831 modelWriter Ljava/util/function/BiConsumer;
+	FIELD field_22830 blockStateCollector Ljava/util/function/Consumer;
+	FIELD field_22831 modelCollector Ljava/util/function/BiConsumer;
+	FIELD field_22832 simpleItemModelExemptionCollector Ljava/util/function/Consumer;
+	METHOD <init> (Ljava/util/function/Consumer;Ljava/util/function/BiConsumer;Ljava/util/function/Consumer;)V
+		ARG 1 blockStateCollector
+		ARG 2 modelCollector
+		ARG 3 simpleItemModelExemptionCollector
+	METHOD method_25508 registerChorusPlant ()V
+	METHOD method_25509 registerComposter ()V
+	METHOD method_25510 registerDaylightDetector ()V
+	METHOD method_25511 registerEndRod ()V
+	METHOD method_25512 registerFarmland ()V
+	METHOD method_25513 registerFire ()V
+	METHOD method_25514 registerSoulFire ()V
+	METHOD method_25515 registerFrostedIce ()V
+	METHOD method_25516 registerTopSoils ()V
+	METHOD method_25517 registerCocoaBeans ()V

timeline.bodyText: Why this change? Specifying that it's the model id make it more clear
timeline.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText: this can actually be texture id as well
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: The value serves as a fence; a value in the property higher than to equal to this mark (I should probably rename to fence) value would give the variant map (a variant map is a subset of block state properties to a subset of model variant parameters (model, rotations, etc), such as powered -> model, facing -> x/y, etc) a model that is higherModel, while the other values, less than the mark, would be associated their model be this lowerModel.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: "cube all decorative"? What does "all" mean here? Should it just be registerDecorativeCube?

replies.bodyText: it registers a block with cube_all model and returns a decorative derivative which you can use to register other things like fences, buttons, etc.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: This seems to include things like buttons, signs, fences, pressure plates... Those aren't really decorative. Also, why is this not DecorativeBlockDerivative, like BuiltinBlockDerivative?
timeline.author: Runemoro

replies.bodyText: This one generates block states and models from a base block's texture. Dunno what a better name could be. If this is not Decorative, what name do you suggest?
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Done. now called block texture pool
replies.author: liach
